com.atmecs.falcon.automation.db.service.db.nosql.mongo

Class MongoDBConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.AbstractMongoConfiguration
      • com.atmecs.falcon.automation.db.service.db.nosql.mongo.MongoDBConfiguration

  • public class MongoDBConfiguration
extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.AbstractMongoConfiguration
    MongoDBConfiguration Class defines the DB Configuration. Supports secured connections also.
